blog.name: fandomlife-confessions
blog.title: Fandom Life Confessions
blog.description: From the creator of @fandomlife-universe comes Fandom Life Confessions! Submit all of your fandom-related confessions here!

blog.name: billybatson-rates-dogs
blog.title: S H A Z A M !

summary: Spring crocus lilac and sweet pea
question: Spring crocus lilac and sweet pea
answer:
Describe your favorite childhood memory: It’s gotta be a tie between the day I became Shazam, and the day @aiden-ros adopted me. I definitely wasn’t expecting either thing to happen, but I’m really happy they did! I couldn’t imagine my life without being Shazam, and I don’t know where I’d be without Mom!

Describe your first relationship or first love: I’m 8…… So I haven’t really had a first love yet?

Describe a difficult goodbye you had to make to a friend or loved one: Um……. My…. My birth parents……… I had to say good bye to them when I was really young. Some… Sometimes it still really hurts.

blog.name: stopmakingliberalslookbad
blog.title: STOP MAKING LIBERALS LOOK BAD!
blog.description:
Asks will be turned back on once Carlos Albuquerque fucks off.

35. Female. Social democrat. Agnostic. Critical (not gender critical) feminist. Pro-social justice, but anti-extremism. I am well aware that my race, sexual orientation, gender identity, and age offer me certain privileges, thank you very much.

I don't do trigger warnings. I can't keep track of everyone's triggers.

I mostly access the site on my mobile browser, so I won't always see notifications or IMs. I'm not ignoring anybody, I swear!

PLEASE READ MY FAQ BEFORE ASKING ANY QUESTIONS, ESPECIALLY IF IT'S REGARDING MY URL!

Twitter: stfuregressives

summary: I don't like the fact that Captain Marvel has attracted both extremes because all criticisms I find out it have a valid points...
question: I don't like the fact that Captain Marvel has attracted both extremes because all criticisms I find out it have a valid points that are then lost to angry politics. I'm not excited for the movie because Brie Larson seems to be very wooden, people have defended it by saying it's a stoic character but there are ways to be stoic while still having lively acting, Larson fails at this. I've seen other people point this out but it's always sandwiched between politics so I lose faith in their argument.

summary: Carol Danvers (Brie Larson) es la misteriosa persona que fue buscada por Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson) en la última escena de...
body:
Carol Danvers (Brie Larson) es la misteriosa persona que fue buscada por Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson) en la última escena de Avengers: Infinity War, y ella aparecerá en el todavía sin título Avengers 4, presumiblemente para ayudar a acabar con Thanos. Pero antes de eso, ella tiene su propia historia que contar.

La actriz de 29 años, y estrella de la película, fue vista en el set de la nueva película de Marvel el lunes (19 de noviembre) en Los Ángeles. También visto en el set ese día estaba Clark Gregg, quien interpreta el papel de Coulson en el Universo Marvel.

This slideshow requires JavaScript.

Cuando la película llegue a los cines el 8 de marzo de 2019, será la vigésima primera entrada de la MCU, y la primera en protagonizar a una superheroína sola. En la última década, el MCU ha reunido una diversa línea de héroes femeninos, desde brujas y guerreros hasta viudas y avispas. Pero nunca antes una mujer había encabezado su propia historia, hasta que el Captain Marvel, el piloto parcial de Kree, parte humano, hizo su debut en cómics en 1968.

Brie Larson regresa al set para regrabar escenas de Captain Marvel Carol Danvers (Brie Larson) es la misteriosa persona que fue buscada por Nick Fury (

blog.name: gaylor-york
blog.description:
Hi. I’m a queer woman, I live in Manhattan and I have run a big paramore-themed tumblr for about 9 years. This blog started as a sideblog for my gifs. Now, it’s my personal blog. If you’re here without getting an invite from me, fuck off.

.

Friends and mutuals, thank you for reading/following/watching/etc.

.

.

summary:
Well!...
After much internal debate with myself and an initial accidental wrong size purchase (which I will have to resell when...
body:
Well!…

After much internal debate with myself and an initial accidental wrong size purchase (which I will have to resell when I get them), I am now, finally, the proud owner of a pair of size M7 / W8.5, Marvel X Vans, Captain Marvel Vans.

reblog.comment:

After much internal debate with myself and an initial accidental wrong size purchase (which I will have to resell when I get them), I am now, finally, the proud owner of a pair of size M7 / W8.5, Marvel X Vans, Captain Marvel Vans.

title: Captain Marvel Reshoots
body: Brie Larson and Clark Gregg returned for reshoots to perfect the Captain Marel movie before it releases in March. No word if Samuel L. Jackson or any other cast member returned yet. In the picture below Clark Gregg has the VFX dots on his face to make him appear younger, I think they want to give us more of him.

reblog.comment: Brie Larson and Clark Gregg returned for reshoots to perfect the Captain Marel movie before it releases in March. No word if Samuel L. Jackson or any other cast member returned yet. In the picture below Clark Gregg has the VFX dots on his face to make him appear younger, I think they want to give us more of him.

trail.content_raw: Brie Larson and Clark Gregg returned for reshoots to perfect the Captain Marel movie before it releases in March. No word if Samuel L. Jackson or any other cast member returned yet. In the picture below Clark Gregg has the VFX dots on his face to make him appear younger, I think they want to give us more of him.
trail.content: Brie Larson and Clark Gregg returned for reshoots to perfect the Captain Marel movie before it releases in March. No word if Samuel L. Jackson or any other cast member returned yet. In the picture below Clark Gregg has the VFX dots on his face to make him appear younger, I think they want to give us more of him.

summary: Since DC's SHAZAM! & Marvel's Captain Marvel are out soon I wanna recommend that everyone go read the original Captain Marvel...
body:
Since DC’s SHAZAM! & Marvel’s Captain Marvel are out soon I wanna recommend that everyone go read the original Captain Marvel Family comics. Fun fact that DC doesn’t want you to know many of the original comics are in the public domain! So go to comicbookplus.com & Digital Comic Museum and read all of the pre-DC marvel family books!

Just for fun, there was one more forgotten Captain Marvel that came out after Billy and before Mar-Vell and he’s also public domain albeit less cool ;)

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: Destination D Delivers! - GEEKS CORNER - Episode 908
title: Destination D Delivers! - GEEKS CORNER - Episode 908
body:
Destination D Delivers! – GEEKS CORNER – Episode 908

Welcome to GEEKS CORNER! This week there is a LOT to cover after the excitement that came out of Destination D: Celebrating Mickey Mouse! From this special weekend at the Walt Disney World Resort, there is news covering Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge, Epcot, and more! The geeks cover it all! Mickey and Minnie Mouse’s birthday was celebrated on Sunday at the Disneyland Resort with a special cavalcade.…

summary: War of the Realms Is Coming! Starting in April, the award-winning creative team of Jason Aaron, Russell Dauterman, and Matthew...

Starting in April, the award-winning creative team of Jason Aaron, Russell Dauterman, and Matthew Wilson will usher in an event of unparalleled scale! And like the mega-event Secret Wars, no corner of the Marvel Universe will be untouched!
